overall_summary: Community discussion centered on the AI16Z→ElizaOS token migration, including exchange support, a pending self-custody migration portal, and a 90-day migration window. Development conversations focused on Cloud authentication (“login with cloud”), plugin releases/dependency issues, and ongoing GitHub work including a new Polymarket plugin request and test alignment PR.
key_facts: AI16Z tokens are planned to migrate to ElizaOS tokens on November 7 with a 1:6 conversion ratio (1 AI16Z = 6 ElizaOS).
The manual migration window is stated as 90 days.
Several exchanges were cited as supporting migration, including MEXC, Gate, Binance Alpha, and Bybit, with MEXC described as the first to complete the swap for users.
A migration portal is planned for non-custodial/self-custody wallet holders, with the URL to be announced via official channels.
Phantom wallet support for migration was explicitly stated in Discord Q&A.
Core release version 1.6.4 was announced in Discord.
GitHub issue #6136 (“Polymarket Plugin”) was opened requesting a new Polymarket integration plugin.
GitHub PR #6135 (“fix: align server tests with ElizaOS API changes”) was opened and remained unmerged in the daily snapshot.
In the otc-agent repository, Shaw submitted PR #5 and R0am merged it.
open_questions: Do we have some good news for the price?
Is there any thread, document, etc where I can get up to date with what's coming?
How do you usually deploy Eliza? I want to deploy on AWS

twitter_news_highlights.claim: Crypto.com was linked in Discord as supporting the AI16Z→ElizaOS migration via an X (Twitter) announcement.
Bybit migration support was affirmed in Discord with a link to Bybit’s announcement (referenced by participants).

new_issues_prs.title: Polymarket Plugin
new_issues_prs.author: borisudovicic
new_issues_prs.significance: Requests a new plugin integration for Polymarket.

new_issues_prs.title: fix: align server tests with ElizaOS API changes
new_issues_prs.author: odilitime
new_issues_prs.significance: Updates test suite to match recent API changes.

overall_focus.claim: Daily GitHub activity showed moderate throughput (1 new PR, 1 new issue, 4 active contributors) and included a new plugin request (Polymarket) plus test alignment work for API changes.

discord_updates.summary: Migration timing and exchange-by-exchange procedures dominated discussion; participants reiterated that a self-custody migration portal would be announced, gas would be minimal, the window would be 90 days, and migrated tokens would be tradeable immediately (exchange timing dependent). Communication and marketing improvements were also discussed (team structure clarity, value-accrual explanation, and broader social presence).

Core-dev discussion covered work merged into otc-agent (PR #5), plans for a “login with cloud” SDK for cross-app auth, an “Apps” section in Cloud for domain whitelisting/external app linking, and requests around plugin-sql dependencies and releasing plugin-elizacloud. Sentry CORS errors were characterized as isolated to a single user.

A user requested guidance on deploying a Discord bot; plugin-discord and Discord developer keys were recommended. Separate questions about AWS deployment and where to find up-to-date migration documentation were asked without visible answers in the captured segment.
Conversation was largely social, with limited project content beyond coordinating a town hall featuring “Eliza agents” and planning a stream to promote the “Art Decc0s” OpenSea collection.

Earlier migration framing included: no snapshot, 90-day manual window, exchanges auto-migrating for custodial holdings, and mention that Lighter (perps DEX) would not support AI16Z after migration (ElizaOS listing at Lighter’s discretion).

user_feedback.feedback_summary: Repeated requests for clear migration instructions for self-custody wallets (e.g., Phantom) and for a single up-to-date resource/thread summarizing what’s coming.
Community members asked for clearer communication on team structure/roles and a non-technical explanation of token value accrual.
Requests to improve communication/marketing strategy, expand social media, and add Telegram channels (including Russian language support).
Developer request to release plugin-elizacloud (publish via package.json version bump) and address plugin-sql dependency issues.

strategic_insights.theme: Migration communications load and support overhead
strategic_insights.insight: Migration timing variance across exchanges and delays led to repeated procedural questions, especially from self-custody wallet holders waiting for the portal link. A consolidated migration playbook (exchange-specific + wallet-specific) and a single canonical announcement link were repeatedly requested in-chat.
implications_or_questions: Should a pinned “migration hub” page be published before/at portal launch (wallet steps + exchange links + FAQ)?
Is there an internal owner for real-time exchange status updates during the first 24–48 hours?

strategic_insights.theme: Cloud becoming an identity layer for multiple apps
strategic_insights.insight: Core-dev discussion proposes a “login with cloud” SDK and a Cloud “Apps” section for domain whitelisting and external app linking, positioning Cloud as shared authentication/authorization infrastructure across multiple Eliza ecosystem apps.
implications_or_questions: What are the minimum security requirements for domain whitelisting and app linking (auditing, revocation, permissions)?

market_analysis.observation: Discord participants referenced short-term volatility (40% up followed by 20% down) during migration discussion.
market_analysis.relevance: Price volatility can increase support load and amplify demand for clear, time-bound migration instructions.

market_analysis.observation: Users raised concerns about futures positions on exchanges delisting AI16Z ahead of migration.
market_analysis.relevance: Derivatives market handling may affect user risk and perception during ticker/token transitions.

market_analysis.observation: A warning was shared about a 35% APY USDC offering being exposed to systemic risk via XUSD, with a caution that funds may become trapped.
market_analysis.relevance: Community risk discussion may influence treasury/collateral integrations and messaging around yield strategies.

market_analysis.observation: Liquidity pool deployment for ElizaOS was listed as a technical action item in Discord.
market_analysis.relevance: LP availability can affect post-migration trading conditions and user experience.
